attributes.action: Must be over 12 (or accompanied by an adult if under) to Enter a Skate Park
attributes.additional_details: The Government should restrict the ages of people using Skate Parks. To enter a Skate Park, skaters must be over the age of 12 (or attending Secondary School), if they are under 12 they must be accompanied by a responsible adult: carers, parent or guardians.

rejection.details: For the local council to decide upon.
